runs.comm: angled across outside off, Masakadza leaves it be. Lots of shouting  and encouragement from the fielders here
pushed across the right-hander again but a bit too full, HM powers a drive to mid-off, Afridi is hit on the knees as he tries to field
drags his length back immediately. Length ball outside off which is defended into the off side off the back foot
fuller than a good length now on middle and off, great lines these. Masakadza can only pat the ball to cover
huge appeal but that pitched outside leg. HM shuffles across off stump as he tries to work the ball into the leg side but pitched well outside. Never going to be given, especially with that angle
ooh, just wide of point. Great over from Tanvir. Full and moving away from Chamu who prods at the ball as it takes the outside half of the bat and lobs just wide of Shehzad at point
poor line first up, drifts on HM's pads, who can't get enough bat on that. Rolls off his thigh pads towards square leg
low full toss outside off, tough to handle from that height. Chamu pushes the ball to mid-on though
a lazy piece of fielding at square leg, full delivery on middle and leg which is pushed tamely to square leg, the misfield gives them a single
nice shot. Length delivery outside off, HM plays the ball late and runs the ball down to third man
good length now and moving away from Chamu. He chops the ball into the ground towards point
back of a length on off, great lines. defended into the cover region off the back foot
good adjustment from Tanvir. HM advances down the track very early and Tanvir follows him and bowls it at a good length, cramping him for any room he desired. Just bunted to midwicket
tight line again on middle, at a good length, pushed wide of midwicket towards mid-on for a single
slower delivery on a fourth-stump line. Chamu looks for one but can only pat the ball to cover

given. That looked iffy, but a persistent appeal may have affected the decision. Pitched well outside leg and struck him above the knee roll of the pads. Poor decision from the umpire. So the pressure has released in the form of a wicket
good length, moving into the left-hander. Ervine plays a solid defense off the front foot
good length once more outside off, Ervine pushes the ball to cover with minimal feet movement
good single. Good length on off, Masakadza pushes the ball into the off side with soft hands and calls for a quick single, gets a good response from his partner
some more inward movement to the left-hander with the angle. Awkwardly played towards square leg
what a shot that was. He has clobbered that. Length delivery on leg, and Masakadza has had enough of prodding, he smashes this with immaculate timing well over the square leg boundary
back of a length on middle and leg, defended into the off side
expansive shot again, got to be careful of his health with that shot. He gets down and tries to play a lap sweep over short fine lg, gets smashed on the helmet. But he is fine.

gone this time, good shot selection but the ball kept rising on him and he has ramped the ball straight to third man. very unfortunate for Hammy. He moved across the leg stump, giving himself room. He got a good length ball to try and hit over point but the ball takes the top edge and carries to the fielder. Just what Zimbabwe did not need
poor line to start, full and a few stumps down the leg stump, called wide
straightened a touch on middle, defended
goes on straighter with the arm, somehow he gets bat on it.

has he got him? what a sad way to go. Mutumbami pushes the ball towards cover, but Afridi makes an excellent diving stop and the fielder at extra cover backs up well and returns a good throw to the bowler who takes the bails out, to find Ervine short.
full and wide, smashed to Afridi at cover again.
overpitched on off stump, tamely defended to cover again.
slower this time on leg, grips a touch. Blocked into the leg side. Not great batting from Mutumbami. Just looked to play him out instead of looking for singles at least
short and wide from Irfan, Williams chops the ball behind point for one, there is a diving attempt from Shehzad but the ball goes through him. Some miscommunication but they get through
fuller than a good length on middle, another tame block to mid-on
somehow RM gets the ball through. Fuller length moving away, RM skews the ball past point uppishly. Williams forces him to come back for three
bad ball. Short and wide, should have been put away. But Williams gets beaten on the inside edge as he tries to cut
absolutely lovely shot. The shot of the innings. Full and wide, Williams leans on the drive and finds the gap through cover. Exemplary timing
good length to finish a successful Powerplay for Pakistan. Outside off and defended to point

gone, goes through his defenses. Wasim has been bowling that throughout the tour so far but Mutumbami's scratchy innings ends. Very poor match awareness from RM. Looks to play a drive, leaving a huge gap between bat and pad. The ball sneaks through and clatters the stumps
skidder on leg, pushed to midwicket with the angle
and another overpitched ball that doesn't spin. But the full length allows Raza to push the ball to long-off
some spin now. slower through the air from over the wicket to Williams who stays back and pushes the ball to long-on with the turn
nicely bowled, flat but slow through the air on leg stump. Blocked off the front foot
nice variations here. Slower and extracts a bit of turn outside off, pushed to point off the back foot
nice pace to start, not too fast or slow. The legspinner outside off which is pushed wide of point for one
this one doesn't spin too much. Pushed through a bit quick on middle and leg and full, Raza inside-edges towards the leg side
googly, but doesn't land that right. Very short and hardly gets up but Williams swats the ball to long-off
fullish length outside off, not much turn. Cut to point
may have been the googly or the topspinner on leg stump, Raza swivels and pulls to deep square leg
his usual not-much-turn, legspinner on leg. Williams calmly whips the ball to deep mdiwicket
flatter and full on off, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, but a bit too full. Driven to long-on with the spin
was that a chance? Full down leg, but Raza falls over and takes his feet out of the crease, rizwan is unable to collect cleanly
short and wide and deserved to be put away and is. Nicely cut past point for a boundary. Easy pickings
very full on off stump, driven without trouble to long-off
flat and quick on middle, awkwardly punched back to the bowler, was hustled a bit for pace
that one doesn't turn either. Full and on leg, pushed to midwicket
the googly on middle on a fuller length, driven to cover
great shot from Williams. Real quality. Gets to the pitch of the ball and swats the ball in the air over midwicket and the ball goes to the boundary.
short googly outside off, chopped wide of cover
almost sneaks through. This one doesn't turn either. Raza somehow gets bat on it and the ball squirts down to fine leg off the inside edge
short and wide, cut fiercely to the sweeper cover
very full and straight, Raza drills a drive to long-on
Williams works the ball off his pads to deep square leg for one
slowed up really nicely. Grips a bit too off the pitch and pushed out to cover
beautiful flight and variation this. Flighted on off, Raza opens the face of the bat to guide the ball to deep cover
flat and quick on leg, smashed down to long-on
very short and wide, that was a poor ball. Fiercely cut-driven to deep cover.
drifter from Afridi on a fourth-stump line, steered to short third man
chipped in the gap through midwicket but the fielder is quick on it and keeps the batsmen down to one. Too full on middle allowing Williams to get under the ball
another quicker delivery on off, dabbed to short third man
nurdled off his pads to deep square leg
Raza dances down the track now and drives it wide of cover, Williams puts the pressure on malik at long-off, and there is a misfield giving em an extra
extremely full on off, drilled to long-on
starts off with his usual slow delivery on off, cut to short third man for one
very full on off, not much pace on the ball and Williams chooses to sight the bowler as he plays one back to him, he misfields in his follow through
short and wide, and smashed to cover. Afridi is very quick on it and returns a good throw but Imran cannot collect cleanly
very full again, Raza doesn't get under it but drills one past Williams. The fielder gets across and fields
what an effort that. Asolutely incredible effort from Imad. Short on middle, heaved away to midwicket where Imad runs across and puts in a full-length dive but cannot hold on
very slow outside off, Raza slogs at that and misses by a distance. Excellent slower ball, just no pace on that at all
full down leg, Williams misses out on an opportunity for some runs. gets struck on the pads as he tries to sweep
googly on middle, Williams comes down and bunts the ball to cover
shortish and wide outside off stump, Raza is happy to use that width to cut to the sweeper
reverse-swept away to the boundary, great shot. really good innings this. Waits for the googly to turn before helping it along its way to the third man boundary
swept away from leg to deep square leg
no run again, quicker and flatter outside off, cut to point
short ball outside off, Williams heaves the pull to deep midwicket. The ball swerves on Maqsood but he dives and stops it from going through
overpitched on off, clipped towards midwicket. Sufficiently in the gap for two
swept away into the gap to the right of long-on this time from outside off, Shehzad at midwicket cuts the ball off
low full toss outside off, driven to the sweeper cover
very slow outside off, Williams is beaten by the lack of pace but improvises well to push to long-off
cut away nicely into the gap past point for two more. Too slow and too wide, enabling Raza to find the gap
shorter outside off, slower ball. Williams misses the pull as he tries to heave
another good slower ball outside off, Williams fails to make contact again. Another precious dot ball
Tanvir is persisting with the slower, short deliveries outside off, Williams swipes the ball with all his might to deep midwicket
falls short of the fielder. Full and wide, Raza looks to find the gap over cover but the ball squirts out off the outer half behind point
very full on off, driven to long-off. Shehzad naughtily returns a very wide throw and the batsmen return for a second run.
slower legcutter outside off, Raza is trying to find the boundary but he is unable to. Flat-batted to cover for one. Expert bowling from Tanvir

bowled im. The ugly heave results in his wicket. Very slow ball on middle stump, Raza dances down the track and swings across the line, the ball keeps low and creeps through to pick up an important wicket.
slow full delivery, but Chigumbura walks down the track and converts it into a yorker. Defends back to the bowler
slower on leg now, heaved away to deep square leg in the gap allowing them two

he has pushed the ball over the boundary, six for ZIm. It was a slow, length delivery on middle, Chigumbura powers the ball down the ground with a lot of muscle, Shehzad at long-off settles under it but parries the ball over the boundary
another one. he hits this one much better. Very full on off, he anticipates that pace and clobbers this well over Shehzad at long-off
very full outside off, driven to long-off and they get back for another single
slower delivery outside off, completely throws Chigs off. late, he decides to ramp the ball to third man but no connection
short delivery on middle now, swatted away from Chigs in the gap wide of square leg for a brace

out now, that is the end of a short, bright and sweet cameo from Chigs. Not much he could do from this situation. Slower ball again outside off, Chigs drags the ball from there into Malik's hands at long-on.

oh nice shot from Williams. Good length and very pacey, not a good ball with third man up. Williams was always picking that gap with him struggling for breath a bit. Just steers the ball past short third man for four.
good short ball, well directed too following Williams as he backs away. Williams misses his pull. Vital boundary
he is happy with one considering it was the last ball of the over. very full from Irfan, Williams executes a good-looking drive to long-off
good length on off stump, Williams stays in his crease and pushes the ball to the sweeper cover. Just one
excellent execution. Slower ball outside off, Jongwe gets down and plays the lap sweep. Gets under it nicely and finds the gap with adequate connection to the fine leg boundary
low full toss this time, Jongwe is beaten for pace as he can only hit the ball to long-on
full on middle and leg, Williams plays the ball in the gap to long-on and scampers back for two
slower delivery, short and on middle, swatted away to long-on. Shehzad is quick on it and keeps them down to one

he goes for the reverse-lap now. Not bad shot selection if he can play that well enough but the ball is full and quick just outside off. He is struck on the pads and thee is an appeal, but the ball hit him outside the off stump
overpitched outside off, squeezed out to midwicket for one
Williams reverse-sweeps now. Just about makes connection with the low, full toss. Goes straight to short third man. Very hard now.
slower delivery, full and outside off. Smashed uppishly on the bounce to deep midwicket who has cleverly moved a bit straighter
slower again outside off, massive slog but no connection

nicely taken. Good stuff from Imran. Very slow again on middle, Jongwe heaves the ball across the line and the ball goes straight up. Imran gets under it himself, and takes a good catch. Never looked like dropping that.
short and wide from Imran, flat-batted to Afridi at cover and Pakistan complete a 2-0 series win. Excellent effort from the bowlers again. Zimbabwe fall short again.
